message.content:
{"id": "18335", 
"title": "Perspective contents lost when view is maximized", 
"description": "All the contents of the perspective (views, layout info) are lost when the following actions are performed in F1: Maximize a view in any perspective. Only the maximized view is actually present and all other views are missing from the perspective. It seems that the view maximize code replaces the page layout with a temporary one that contains only the maximized view.", 
"OB": "When a view is maximized in any perspective, all other views and layout information in the perspective are lost.", 
"EB": "", 
"SR": "To reproduce the issue, switch to another perspective, exit the workbench, then open the workbench again and switch to the perspective with the maximized view."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18335', 'title': 'Bug 18335Perspective contents lost when view is maximized', 'description': '', 'OB': 'Bug 18335Perspective contents lost when view is maximized All the contents of the perspective (views, layout info) is lost when thefollowing actions are performed in F1:Maximize a view in any perspective. Observe that only the maximized view is actually present and all otherviews are missing from the perspective.As far as I can remember, view maximize code replaced the page layout with atemporary one that contained only the maximized view. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Switch to another perspective and exit theworkbench. Open the workbench and switch to the perspective with the maximizedview. '}
